catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 425
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: The details of the figure are made up of calligraphic allusions to the deity's attributes and qualities.
inscription: Without a Chinese robe, / yet known as the god of Kitano, / because of a branch of plum tree / held in a sleeve. / [Figure made of characters for Namu Tenman Daijizai Tenjin.]
text: Without a Chinese robe, / yet known as the god of Kitano, / because of a branch of plum tree / held in a sleeve. / Figure made of characters for Namu Tenman Daijizai Tenjin.
title: Tenjin on His Way to China
